CustomField.description: The reason that the "Flagged for Cancellation" check box has been checked. This field is required if the "Flagged for Cancellation" check box is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The reason that the "Flagged for Cancellation" check box has been checked. This field is required if the "Flagged for Cancellation" check box is checked.
CustomField.label: Flagged For Cancellation Reason
